ing: 1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger coconut flavored rum
3 1/2 fluid ounces guava flavored juice cocktail
des: "This colorful and refreshing beverage of coconut rum, guava juice cocktail, and grenadine, recalls the dawn and rising tide along Cape Cod."
ins: Pour rum over ice in a highball glass. Fill the glass with guava juice cocktail; stir. Drizzle the grenadine syrup over the top.
